name: Bookmark Sidebar chrome extension dark theme
description:
dark theme for the chrome extension below:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/bookmark-sidebar/jdbnofccmhefkmjbkkdkfiicjkgofkdh?utm_source=chrome-ntp-icon

I'm totally aware of the extension might update in near future, rendering this style out of date easily, but it was relatively easy for me to create this style so i just created it for the dark theme.
